Pre-Game Insights: The Celtics opened the season with a 132-109 win over the New York Knicks
The Celtics tied an NBA record with 29 3-pointers in the game
Post-Match Reflections: Jayson Tatum expressed his emotions during the pre-game ceremony
Coach Joe Mazzulla was proud of the team's mindset after the ceremony
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Celtics wore special warm-up jackets with 18 championship trophies embroidered on the sleeve
The pregame ceremony included appearances from 96-year-old Bob Cousy, a six-time NBA champion, and 1981 Finals MVP Cedric Maxwell
Others: The Celtics' 2024 World Championship banner was raised prior to the game
The Celtics' championship rings were diamond-, emerald-, and parquet-encrusted
